title: Hawkes, John - The Cannibal.epub
description:
"No synopsis conveys the quality of this now famous novel about an hallucinated Germany in collapse after World War II. John Hawkes, in his search for a means to transcend outworn modes of fictional realism, has discovered a highly original technique for objectifying the perennial degradation of mankind within a context of fantasyÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Nowhere has the nightmare of human terror and the deracinated sensibility been more concisely analyzed than in The Cannibal.
